verses.text: \w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w months|strong="H2320"\w*,

\w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w summoned|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w diviners|strong="H7080"\w*, saying, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*? \w Tell|strong="H3045"\w* \w us|strong="H6213"\w* \w how|strong="H4100"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w back|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w its|strong="H6213"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.”

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* replied, “\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w empty|strong="H7387"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H3045"\w* \w means|strong="H3027"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Him|strong="H7971"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* guilt \w offering|strong="H4480"\w*. \w Then|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w healed|strong="H7495"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w understand|strong="H3045"\w* \w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w His|strong="H7971"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w lifted|strong="H3478"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.”

“\w What|strong="H4100"\w* guilt offering \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* send \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Him|strong="H7725"\w*?” \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*. “\w Five|strong="H2568"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w tumors|strong="H6076"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* rats,” \w they|strong="H3588"\w* said, “according \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \w of|strong="H4557"\w* rulers \w of|strong="H4557"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* same \w plague|strong="H4046"\w* \w has|strong="H4100"\w* struck \w both|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* rulers.

\w Make|strong="H6213"\w* \w images|strong="H6754"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w tumors|strong="H6076"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* rats \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* ravaging \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land. \w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* perhaps \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w lift|strong="H5414"\w* \w His|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* gods \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* land.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w harden|strong="H3513"\w* \f + \fr 6:6 \ft Or make heavy; similarly again in this verse\f* \w your|strong="H3513"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w* \w as|strong="H3824"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4713"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w hardened|strong="H3513"\w* theirs? \w When|strong="H7971"\w* \w He|strong="H3808"\w* afflicted \w them|strong="H7971"\w*, \w did|strong="H4100"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* \w on|strong="H7971"\w* \w their|strong="H7971"\w* \w way|strong="H3212"\w* \w as|strong="H3824"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w departed|strong="H3212"\w*?

Hitch \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cows|strong="H6510"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cart|strong="H5699"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w calves|strong="H1121"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* pen \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*.

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w cart|strong="H5699"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* chest \w beside|strong="H6654"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w objects|strong="H3627"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w sending|strong="H7971"\w* \w Him|strong="H5414"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* guilt \w offering|strong="H3068"\w*. \w Then|strong="H1980"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* ark \w on|strong="H1980"\w* \w its|strong="H5414"\w* \w way|strong="H1980"\w*,

\w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* watching \w it|strong="H1931"\w*. \w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w goes|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w road|strong="H1870"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w its|strong="H6213"\w* homeland, \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* \w Beth-shemesh|strong="H1053"\w*, \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w us|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w disaster|strong="H7451"\w*. \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w His|strong="H7200"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* punished \w us|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w happened|strong="H1961"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w chance|strong="H4745"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* instructed. \w They|strong="H3651"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* milk \w cows|strong="H6510"\w*, hitched \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w cart|strong="H5699"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* penned \w up|strong="H3607"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w calves|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cows|strong="H6510"\w* headed \w straight|strong="H3474"\w* \w up|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w road|strong="H1870"\w* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* \w Beth-shemesh|strong="H1053"\w*, staying \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H5704"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w highway|strong="H4546"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w lowing|strong="H1600"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w*, \w never|strong="H3808"\w* straying \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w left|strong="H8040"\w*. \w The|strong="H5921"\w* rulers \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w followed|strong="H1980"\w* \w behind|strong="H1980"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w Beth-shemesh|strong="H1053"\w*.

Now \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w people|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w Beth-shemesh|strong="H1053"\w* \w were|strong="H5869"\w* \w harvesting|strong="H7105"\w* \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w* \w in|strong="H8055"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w valley|strong="H6010"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w they|strong="H5375"\w* \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* ark, \w they|strong="H5375"\w* \w were|strong="H5869"\w* overjoyed \w at|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w cart|strong="H5699"\w* \w came|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Beth-shemesh \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w stopped|strong="H5975"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w near|strong="H6086"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w large|strong="H1419"\w* rock. \w The|strong="H3068"\w* people chopped \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w cart|strong="H5699"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w cows|strong="H6510"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* rulers \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w*, \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w same|strong="H1931"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w As|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* guilt \w offering|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w one|strong="H3068"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* tumor \w for|strong="H3068"\w* each city: Ashdod, \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w*, Ashkelon, \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* rats \w also|strong="H3068"\w* corresponded \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Philistine|strong="H6430"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* belonging \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* rulers—\w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fortified|strong="H4013"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* outlying \w villages|strong="H3724"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w large|strong="H1419"\w* rock \f + \fr 6:18 \ft Or great meadow; Hebrew Abel-haggedolah\f* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w placed|strong="H3240"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* stands \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Beth-shemesh.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w some|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Beth-shemesh|strong="H1053"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* \w inside|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w men|strong="H1419"\w*,\f + \fr 6:19 \ft A few late Hebrew manuscripts and Josephus; most Hebrew manuscripts 70 men and 50,000 men; LXX 70 men and 50,000 men of the people; Syriac and Arabic 70 men and 5,000 men; alternately, possibly 70 men and 50 oxen\f* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w mourned|strong="H7657"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w them|strong="H5221"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H4347"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* men \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Beth-shemesh|strong="H1053"\w* asked, “\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*? \w To|strong="H3201"\w* \w whom|strong="H4310"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* ark \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w here|strong="H2088"\w*?”

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Kiriath-jearim|strong="H7157"\w*, saying, “\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w Come|strong="H5927"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H7725"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w*.”
